name: Custom Dread Falls
description: One pair of 40 count (each) dread falls mounted on elastic ribbon (black or white, depending on chosen colours). Your choice of colours (choose up to 5), available in the following styles: - solid - candy cane - transitional - blended Please select the length you require from the drop down menu and contact me using the contact page to specify your style and colour choices. Colour Charts (opens in a new window): Natural Colours, Fancy Colours. Dreads are handmade to order. Please allow up to 28 days for completion.
